text:
Are there any modules so you can make a section divider that can be either an image or video, like on this site?
<https://offers.cloud-elements.com/definitive-guide-to-api-integration>

I have one that I’ve make some adjustments to, but when I select “Video”, instead of only filling the area, it fills the entire screen.
You can see how the divider works with an image, but the second one later down the page is causing the video background to fill.
Is there a way to use a CTA in module that doesn’t use javascript to load it?
Not with HubSpots default modules but you could def make something like this pretty quickly as a custom module.
